channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- CX-One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- CX-One

item.title: CVE-2020-27259|2024-08-04T16:11:36.396Z -- omron -- cx-one
item.description: The Omron CX-One Version 4.60 and prior may allow an attacker to supply a pointer to arbitrary memory locations, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-27261|2024-08-04T16:11:36.439Z -- omron -- cx-one
item.description: The Omron CX-One Version 4.60 and prior is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-27257|2024-08-04T16:11:36.464Z -- omron -- cx-one
item.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code due to the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a type-confusion condition in the Omron CX-One Version 4.60 and prior devices.
